column2: The ancient bloodline that has ruled the Visegrad Empire ever since Árpád the Conqueror united it, and which traces back its origins to the legendary warrior Toldi Miklós.
A great, gifted warrior, thought to be a descendant of the divine White Mare herself.

One of the greatest commanders in all of the World's history, the Corsican quickly rose along the military ranks to become Emperor of the French from 1804 until 1814, and again in 1815. Napoleon dominated European and global affairs for more than a decade while leading France against a series of coalitions in the Napoleonic Wars. He won most of these wars and the vast majority of his battles, building a large empire that ruled over continental Europe before its final collapse in 1815.
A true heir to the vacant throne has been declared they and their offspring are considered by all to be the rightful heir to Albion and the Empire that Never Sets, The United Kingdom!
A legendary sorceror-queen of old whose sons would go on to found mighty kingdoms. Many of the noble clans of Scandinavia therefore claim descent from her.
The first Folketro king of Denmark who for a time broke the hegemony of the Lutheran lords there.
The Kypriot founders of the Turkish empire, whose rule benefited to all faiths of the Empire alike.
Furkan Sarikaya was the faithful general of Demetrios Ghazi, whose descendants ruled ably over Karadeniz for centuries and even held the imperial throne of Turkey at one point.
